original_text: Then the woman came out to meet him! She was wearing the clothes of a prostitute. She knew what she wanted to do.
korean_text: 그 때에 기생의 옷을 입은 간교한 여인이 그를 맞으니

sentences.original_text: Then the woman came out to meet him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 여자가 그를 만나러 나왔습니다

sentences.original_text: She was wearing the clothes of a prostitute
She knew what she wanted to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자신이 하고 싶은 일을 알고 있었습니다
